1br - Luxury 1 bedroom with lake view (1 King St. W.) (map)

Date: 2012-03-02, 2:05PM EST
Reply to: gzmch-2880994574@hous.craigslist.org [Errors when replying to ads?]

Luxury 1 bedroom suite in historic condo/hotel building in the heart of downtown Toronto. En suite washer, dryer and dishwasher. Bathroom features separate shower and soaker tub. Unit is sunny, with high ceilings and windows facing east and south with a great view of Lake Ontario.

Building is steps from the city's financial, shopping and entertainment districts. It is also connected underground to the PATH system and King Subway Station. There is 24 concierge and security with room service available as well.

Building amenities include: rooftop gym, sauna, patio, hot tub and workout pool; lobby bar and dining area; meeting rooms; parking available on request.

This unit is ideal for single professionals or couples working in the downtown area. We are seeking responsible, professional tenants who are looking for long term accommodations in a desirable Toronto location.

Please contact Michelle or Alan by email or phone at 647.706.8245

1 King St. W. (google map) (yahoo map)
